alert.note: Alert for Elkhead and Park Mountains; Flat Tops; Southwest San Juan Mountains; West Elk and Sawatch Mountains (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 23 at 1:58PM MST until December 25 at 11:00AM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 20 inches with local amounts up to 2 to 3 feet. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Southwest San Juan Mountains, Elkhead and Park Mountains, Flat Tops and West Elk and Sawatch Mountains. * WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 11 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility, especially on ridge tops. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Elkhead and Park Mountains; Flat Tops; Southwest San Juan Mountains; West Elk and Sawatch Mountains
